name: IT Asset Lookup
description: Query IT asset details directly in Telex. Example: `/assetlookup LAPTOP123`
author: Your Name

commands.name: assetlookup
commands.description: Look up asset details in IT inventory.

parameters.name: asset_id
parameters.description: Enter the hostname or service tag of the asset.

settings.label: Google Sheets API Key
settings.description: Enter your Google Sheets API key.

settings.label: Google Sheet ID
settings.description: Enter the ID of the Google Sheet containing asset data.
